description: This Dart source file defines UI helper widgets and utility functions used for styling and layout within a Flutter application, such as price level, spice level, section headers, pill badges, and seeded hero images.

classes.name: UiHelpers
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for UI-related string representations such as price levels and spice levels.

classes.name: SectionHeader
classes.description: A widget representing a styled section header with a title and optional trailing widget, used for layout separation in the UI.

classes.name: PillBadge
classes.description: A widget representing a stylized badge with optional icon, background, and foreground colors, used for indicating statuses or tags.

classes.name: SeededHeroImage
classes.description: A widget that generates a deterministic, colorful placeholder image based on a seed, often used as a stand-in for network images.

methods.name: priceLevel
methods.description: Returns a string of dollar signs corresponding to the price level (clamped between 1 and 4).

methods.name: spice
methods.description: Returns a string describing spice level ('Mild', 'Medium', 'Hot', or a fire emoji) based on an integer level (clamped between 0 and 3).
